ygData.subject: Re: I have some possible bad news Disenchanting results with  Melody
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Possibly related, but I haven t had much luck canceling my dark elf illusion with the L40 song (targeted cancel magic).  On the other hand, the L22 song
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 22 Mar 1999, SteelWolf wrote:
>
> yourself. I use the target debuff because you can use it on both
> yourself and a monster, and the other only works on yourself only (and
> party) and I believe requires the lute to be equipped to function (it
> also strips 2 buffs though).

Possibly related, but I haven't had much luck canceling my
dark elf illusion with the L40 song (targeted cancel
magic). On the other hand, the L22 song (which requires a
lute) seems to remove the illusion within one or two pulses.
Last night it took 2 pulses though, so there is some success
failure check going on. Who knows what factors go into that.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
